text: The Knife is an Swedish electronic music duo formed in 1999. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * The Knife (2001) * Deep Cuts (2003) * Silent Shout (2006) * Shaking the Habitual (2013) ==References== Category:1999 establishments in Sweden Category:2014 disestablishments in Sweden Category:Musical duos Category:Sibling musical duos Category:Musical groups from Gothenburg Category:Musical groups established in 1999 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2014
title: The Knife (band)
